content.raw: Insert a box, go to the visual inspector and change the geometry to mesh and the uri to something like `/home/louisep/.gazebo/models/drc_practice_ladder/meshes/ladder.dae` and apply. The visual changes properly, but when you save it, it disappears. The collision seems to work well though.
